title: Fuel bowser crashes in Laggala; Two injured
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Two persons were injured when a fuel bowser carrying diesel overturned in the Elonakanda area on the Laggala – Mahiyanganaya main road.
Police stated that the injured men were admitted to the Hettipola Regional Hospital.
Fuel was leaking from the bowser following the accident, reported the News 1st correspondent based in the area.
